website_summaries.verdict: The Bowers & Wilkins PI3 In-Ear Wireless Headphones feature dual drivers in each earpiece for terrific audio performance.
pros: Excellent audio performance with solid bass depth and bright highs

customer_reviews.title: Bass takes time
customer_reviews.text: The best sounding in-ears I’ve tried. However, unless you get the perfect seal the bass is too low, it can sometimes take a few minutes before the lows finally stand out. Really odd, unless it needs to warm up? Anyway, I had to return them for this reason, as I mainly use at work and start stop my music often, also, for some reason it’s £20 more for the grey colour. It’s probably my ear shape, I would definitely give these a go because once you get that sweet spot, they are amazing. It’s a shame the on-ear, over ear (px5, px7) are so much more expensive, as I’d go for those instead.
customer_reviews.author: Ric

customer_reviews.title: The usual B&W quality and performance
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair of over-ear B&W headphones and love them. The P13’s were on sale and I had some spare cash so I took the plunge. They’re great - the sound is well-balanced and full and the earpieces fit very well. I personally didn’t have to play around with the different sizes and shapes that are supplied. If I had one criticism it would be the carry bag that comes with the item. I really don’t have the heart to cram these lovely headphones into this little bag for fear of damaging them. The bag for my P7’s is similarly disappointing so perhaps B&W need to reassess the ‘coolness’ and practicality of the supplied bags.
customer_reviews.author: Paul R. Norton

customer_reviews.title: Poor cable makes them useless
customer_reviews.text: Sounded ok but the new aptx codec didn't work with my OnePlus 7t pro which has all codecs including Ldac so strange that feature didn't work. The reason for the poor score is the cable it's incredibly microphonic, the slightest tap is echoed into your ears. For a sports earphone that cable makes these unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Bad fit, but sound brilliant best for lounge lizards.
customer_reviews.text: Very cumbersome rubber link wire which drags them out of your ears if you move! They come with three size ear shaped fitments but none fit me tight enough to stay in if I move. Constantly pushing them back in every 30 seconds. No way I could exercise in these, although accepting people’s ears are different shapes. On the plus side, if you get them right and don’t move they sound brilliant, with excellent tonal range and sound staging and superb deep deep bass. Amongst best earbuds out there as long as you don’t move. I love them, just don’t move.
customer_reviews.author: jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Unbalanced sound - Expected a lot more.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a month, after that the sound has become unbalanced, it’s as if the left ear isn’t getting a tight seal but is tight. Tbass is definitely suffering because of it. 2019 Mac Book Pro really has a problem with these for some reason. The sound is distant like being up in a plane before your ears pop. Very Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: jrush

customer_reviews.title: Must have excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike. Have got b&w c5 wired in ear headphones which are excellent. But the p13 wireless make me smile. Well worth the money as usual. Had a problem after 6 months but they picked them up and sent a new set as a repair really quickly. Still loving them.
customer_reviews.author: smudge

customer_reviews.title: Great wireless audio quality
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic audio quality, couldn’t have hoped for better! Also have a great finish on them and have a real premium feel. My only issue is that the wire is maybe slightly too long and curled round looking weird when wearing both earphones. Don’t regret purchasing and would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Top wireless headphones
customer_reviews.text: Have tried many wireless headphones / earphones and own several including Sony and Bose. I wanted a set that took advantage of AptX HD on my Android based DAP and a stack of Hi-Res music. I am not disappointed with the. Excellent quality sound with good bass and clear treble from the separate drivers. Cable takes a bit of getting used to but doesn’t get in the way too much!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Mc

customer_reviews.title: Superb sound!
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality absolutely superb not too much base even on higher volumes no loss of quality. Also comfy to wear and decent battery life the earbuds sticking together magnetically is a nice touch and very practical when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Darren M.

customer_reviews.title: B&W PI3
customer_reviews.text: Arrived at 6pm opened it, tried it, by 8pm I have already sent it back! For this money the sound quality is really disappointing! Where is the base in this thing? Its loud, but the music itself seem like without any punch. Listening the same track with this B&W and with apples lightning ear-pod I have to say the ear pod gives you so much more details. I am really disappointed was expecting much more, I am sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Laszlo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is amazing. I use comply tips with these so the noise cancelling is pretty good. Controls are easy to master. Overall a fantastic pair of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: MR M BONSEY

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: A well received Christmas present! Appears to work well and we have experienced no difficulties yet.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Authentic B&W sound
customer_reviews.text: Like C5 Series 2 I had, straight, clear vocal and treble, deep and powerful but clean bass. I listened to rock, pop, trance and classical music. I also used this headphone to listen all kind of movies and it performed excellently. This is one of the best all around headphone I've ever used. It's B&W and it has B&W monitor speaker DNA.
customer_reviews.author: Rin Boonprasan

customer_reviews.title: not convinced...
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars in what hifi so purchased, couldnt get a decent fit in one ear and as with most wireless in ears ive found they just dont go loud enough. sound seemed good and detailed but for the money i just dont think they are worth it so sent back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound quality ,Poor structure
customer_reviews.text: probably the best quality out there in this price bracket, however, broke within 7 days of usage
customer_reviews.author: ET

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: Really good earphones, great sound, and good feet the only negative I got them in gold and is actually more like grey and rose gold but they do look really nice.
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: As with pretty much all bowers and Wilkins products these are brilliant. They look great and sound fantastic
customer_reviews.author: ali molloy

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Love the sound quality , could do with a touch louder but great comfy fit . Wear when training , around the house siting in garden and taking the dog for walk could easily have them In all day .
customer_reviews.author: Jason Brett

customer_reviews.title: Excellent music quality - not good for office work
customer_reviews.text: Excellent headset, went through all the reviews, pros and cons, and was quite excited to get it. Unfortunately it misses some key features, that for me were critical: 1. Ability to stop playing the music when taken off the ears. 2. Enter standby mode when both are earpieces are joined. 3. Reconnect automatically when put on the ears. This mean I had to manually stop the music every time, and in case it entered standby mode, had to re-power on the headset manually. As someone who needs to attend calls quickly when not listening to music, this was a major blocker. Else the music and quality are among the best I've heard.
customer_reviews.author: Anirban

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: B&W should be ashamed to release a product like this, volume is so low you hear all the surrounding noise with the players volume turned all the way up, I tried it with iPhone, android and Astel and kernel kann , sound quality is really bad . It looks like after the eva automation purchase of b&w, quality of some products has gone south and they will use the brand name to ship inferior products. And no I didn't receive free products to review these like every other stellar review here, and u can check the 1 star rating on B&w own site
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Bowers and Wilkins does it again. Superb!
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is very good. I also own Bowers C5-2 wired buds and the sound of the PI3 is better. Pairing was almost immediate with iPhone 11 Pro Max. Suggest using Comply bud covers for optimal listening pleasure. Recommend these highly.
customer_reviews.author: Randy P

customer_reviews.title: Really Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I like this design, very comfortable. The quality is great. The sound is great, the battery life is enough for many hours listening at high volume. The music is detailed, bass, middle and highs are remarkables. I ever use high definition music, is the way to appreciate the detail of the instruments throw this earphones. The magnets in the back side of the speakers could be a little bit more stronger, because is easy with the body movement that this be separated. This brand is highly recommended. I use speakers Bowers & Wilkins in my home theater, and I have another wireless headphones from B&W that also sound great.
customer_reviews.author: Mirope

customer_reviews.title: Do not hesitate to buy these.
customer_reviews.text: I can not recommend this product enough. I have a few B&W products and before this ones had finally bought my first pair of Bluetooth headphones. They were the shure in ear headphones and not only they were to soft but sultry as well. I returned them and I couldn’t be happier with my new pair of headphones. The sound quality is great and they are extremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Great microphone and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I needed wireless headphones for taking work calls at home and for traveling. Earbuds were either uncomfortable or too easy to lose. A few days in, I've really enjoyed these. I've taken calls at airport and people can easily hear me.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica C

customer_reviews.title: Not B&W
customer_reviews.text: After my beloved C5 series 2 earbuds cable finally broke after 4 yrs I decided to try these. I don't know what these are but they are NOT B&W. You can buy a $10 pair of earbuds that can sound better than these.
customer_reviews.author: Nomad8888

customer_reviews.title: Useless after three months
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyed these headphones up until the left earphone blew out after three months. Both Amazon and Bowers & Wilkins are refusing to replace my headphones since this was a used item, even though this is a product defect as over reviewers have reported the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: loses connectivity to IPhone 11 Max frequently
customer_reviews.text: Thought I would try something other than Apple ear buds, and I made a mistake. These needed to be repaired almost everytime I started them, Another time had a flashing purple light and I had to let the battery drain before I could recharge and re-pair. It shouldn't have been this hard. They're in a drawer, I'm back to my Apple earbud pros
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Groseth

customer_reviews.title: Good sound very bad ear piece design
customer_reviews.text: My P13 only lasted one year I lost sound on one side. The Sound quality while they were working was very good for the price. The biggest problem I found with these headphones was the fit of the earpieces very poor design. I cannot recommend the purchase of these headphones whomever Designed the earpieces did a very poor job
customer_reviews.author: Twain Marsan

customer_reviews.title: Dynamite Sound!
customer_reviews.text: The B&W P13 earphones are the best sounding earphones I’ve ever heard. I used to work in a recording studio so I’ve heard great audio, and the P13s deliver magnificently. The bass is powerful without being boomy. The sound is perfectly smooth and never tiring. The P13s are worth their price!
customer_reviews.author: RonC

customer_reviews.title: Music incredible; call quality not so good
customer_reviews.text: Music sounds incredible, but for calls mics pick up a lot of background noise making them useless for what I needed a replacement headset for. Unfortunately I had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Left ear piece has a constant ringing sound
customer_reviews.text: I have to return this item because the unit I received was defective. Basically, the left earpiece has a obvious and constant ringing noise several seconds before and after a song is played, which is very annoying and I couldn't ignore it once I noticed it. It is not the white noise/electrostatic sound in the background that a lot of headphones have, it is more of a high pitched noise.
customer_reviews.author: Ralf

customer_reviews.title: Has potential
customer_reviews.text: Cable running between earphones is very durable and robust however because of its stiffness there is A LOT of cable noise transferred to the earphones that you have to turn up uncomfortably loud to drown out (this occurs only when not stationary i.e at the gym or running as advertised) My pair started exhibiting a loud static noise and popping intermittently when music first started playing on the headphones. App was very easy to use and the headphones go to sleep when not in use, extending battery life. If these issues are fixed easily a 5 star product.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique Rhymes

customer_reviews.title: Love these! But hold on to your rubbers...
customer_reviews.text: These are great! One thing to be aware of is that if you lose one of the rubber ear buds, it may be hard to find one that you have from other brands to fit. These seem to have a slightly smaller diameter on the fitting portion of the rubber ear bud. Otherwise, incredible sound and worthy of 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Dabo for President

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Bose QuietControl 30 and Bose Buds for over 3 years now. The sound quality of P13 is orders of magnitude more impressive. It is almost comparable to my Bowers & Wilkins 600 Series Floorstanding Speaker
customer_reviews.author: Anshu Gaind

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and probably the only Bluetooth earphones in the market with aptx adaptive codec. Works perfectly on my Pixel 2 xl. Clarity is excellent with crisp high despite lacking a bit of bass to my taste. The material it made of is flexible and feels premium. It is lightweight and comfort on my ears but it takes some time to find the right fit. Battery life is just acceptable. Overall a great choice if you like Bluetooth neckband.
customer_reviews.author: Yukee

customer_reviews.title: Strap is poorly designed
customer_reviews.text: The strap design on this is very uncomfortable and awkward. The strap was not symmetrical so it always leaned to one side and would not sit well. It is very annoying to have this cord slapping your neck when you are running, and can even pull the headphones out of your ears. Like a lot of BT headphones, there was a light hiss. Sound quality was above average.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Connolly

customer_reviews.title: Not up to B & W standards
customer_reviews.text: Sound was not as full as expected. Battery life minimal compared to others. Not comfortable. Not worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: hiseitz

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: These sound as good as my wired Shure earbuds. I use an equalizer app on my phone but it is somewhat unnecessary as these sound great without it.
customer_reviews.author: Hard Worker

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is very good for wear buds in this price range. I have a pair Bose sport something or another that are louder but the sound quality doesn’t even come close.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very poor sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Really poor sound... This thing has no bass at all! It’s not for those who like music (any kind of music). It’s a pity because the overall quality is great and it’s very nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: Andy_FL

customer_reviews.title: Earbud Covers are easy to loose and replacements are expensive.
customer_reviews.text: The earbud covers and fins come off and are super easy to loose. I just ordered a new set from B&W. $15 a set + $15 shipping. Seems like a big rip off for $.50 worth of silicone. If anyone is looking, you can get them from bwgroupusa.com P/N: ZE02828. What a rip off!!
customer_reviews.author: lurchman70

customer_reviews.title: sounds OK
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are just ok. One step above the cheap ones you find for 20 bucks. Not nearly the quality I expected after reading reviews. The bose neckphones are way, way, way better.
customer_reviews.author: alan l hellbusch

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, but broke within 1 month on original and replacement
customer_reviews.text: Title says it all. Original unit and replacement both stopped working within a month. I really wanted to like these - sound great, good bluetooth performance, and mic works well for calls.
customer_reviews.author: ZZZZ

customer_reviews.title: Awesome headphones
customer_reviews.text: Awesome headphones : good range in sound and comfort !!
customer_reviews.author: J J V

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Last
customer_reviews.text: Initially enjoyed these. But today, enjoyment ended; left bud died. Lightly used, no drops. Maddening. Docked two stars. Caveat emptor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clarity and depth, battery life is good
customer_reviews.text: The clarity and depth are very good. The battery life is very good for the crop of 2019 wireless ear buds. It’s a comfortable wear.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: 4.9 of 5
customer_reviews.text: Excellent but even better if equalizer capability and volume capability higher/louder for outdoor use
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: Great bass performance for small size ear set.  More superb than Shure.
customer_reviews.text: The best ear set I have seen so far for a competitive pricing.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Superior sound quality!!
customer_reviews.text: 1st & foremost, I love B&W products, their products always seem to be on the next level, this was the only time that a B&W product had to grow on me, the earphone tips can easily be lost, which happened, but someone who also purchased these recommended to get the comply earbuds to go with these headphones... they truly gave good info & my headphones function superior to any in ear headphones, no worries or issues now!
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Stunning Audio
customer_reviews.text: I have spent way too much on headphones and earbuds. With respect to ear buds had I purchased these first I could have saved a lot of money. Build quality excellent. Comfort Excellent. Controls accessible and responsive. Audio quality stunning. If your in the market these should be your choice unless you just want a large now unused collection like I have. Not a lot of bells and whistles just straight forward excellent audio.
customer_reviews.author: G. Stricklin

customer_reviews.title: Nice earphones
customer_reviews.text: The sound is fantastic. This has dual drivers for beautiful highs and lows and separate amplifiers. The silicone and rubber housing makes the earbuds comfortable and lightweight. You can wear them for up to 8 hours of use and then do a 15 minute recharge for another two hours. These are so nice, you will not even notice them while you wear them. I sleep with my headphone or earbuds and I often find that they will hurt my ears. These don't. Smaller is better.
customer_reviews.author: CoCo's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Sound, Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These wireless buds deliver very good sound. I like these for walking – they are very comfortable & the silicone /rubber cord can be wiped clean. I like that they have a cord. I’ve had to chase down earbuds that have fallen out of my ears. They are very easy to set up & the buttons are intuitive. The BT works flawlessly with my S10. The sound is very good – crisp highs & plenty of bass. Calls are clear – both receiving & speaking. Battery life is very good & very close to the 8 hour claim. Of course, that all depends on the volume, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Katawampas

customer_reviews.title: Another great product from Bowers & Wilkins!
customer_reviews.text: Bowers & Wilkins strikes again with a combination of high quality and style. Like their headphones, the sound quality on these is amazing (and the mic sounds good, too)! They have a sleek high-quality look to them, and even the process of powering them on and connecting to Bluetooth is made cooler by a pleasant voice in your ears telling you the connection has been made. The around-the-neck cord makes these great in the gym, because (unlike my wireless Bluetooth earbuds) I don't have to figure out where to put the earbuds when I take them on; I can just let these dangle—and having access to volume controls without reaching for my phone is nice!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Delicate but dark and warm sound.
customer_reviews.text: As I write this I'm listening to the Fleet Foxes album, "Crack-Up" on these headphones, and most of what I have to say is these headphones do that material justice, which is high praise. The sound, overall is deleciate, but somber and detailed. I find them very comfotable out of the box. I don't think I could be any happier with them right now :-)
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Goodchild

customer_reviews.title: Best Bluetooth earphone on the market
customer_reviews.text: I am not a sound engineer but have had multiple high quality sound bars, speakers and headphone by Bose. This earphone provides crisp and just right amount of spike of sounds you can ask for from such small unit. Hold for 5 second and it starts looking for your device. You’re connected within 10 seconds. Pairing has not failed once yet. Battery seems to last really long time. I charged and used for full 5 days of gym work out. Charged filled within couple hours. Very comfortable and sleek I’m design as well. For $200, this is a steal.
customer_reviews.author: It works!

customer_reviews.title: fantastic sound
customer_reviews.text: These are the best sounding earbuds I have ever used. The level of bass is incredible for such a small earbud, there is exceptional clarity in the sound, and I am overall very impressed. They are relatively comfortable to wear - a thousand times more comfortable than the junky earbuds that come with most devices, but still not as comfortable as over the ear or on ear cans. The neck portion flops around a bit if you wear these on a run, but not to the point that they are unusable. Definitely impressed with these.
customer_reviews.author: Osprey

customer_reviews.title: Best Earbuds I've Owned
customer_reviews.text: I've never had earbuds this good before. I've had plenty of over-ear headphones that sound like this, but to have this depth of sound in earbuds is amazing. They're fairly comfortable, and the neck-rest design seems quite smart. I feel like it allows for these things to have a big battery which gives a lot of listening time while making them not heavy on your ear because your neck is helping with the weight. Overall, these are brilliantly designed, from ergonomics to sound quality, and are definitively my best pair of earbuds!
customer_reviews.author: Dipped in Ink

customer_reviews.title: These headphones are some of the best headphones I’ve ever owned
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I have a pair of the leading brand head phones and I stopped using them because the quality and comfort of these are amazing. I have been using them daily for about a month and I only have to charge them every other day as where I had to charge my normal Bluetooth ones after every three hours of use. They haven’t ever slipped out of my ears like the other brands do and just feel so much more comfortable. The sound quality is the same if not better than most leading brand headphone as well.
customer_reviews.author: T. Thrash

customer_reviews.title: Great Earphone, But the Strap.....
customer_reviews.text: I really love the sound quality of these earphones. They simply fantastic. I also appreciate the long battery life. My last set of earphones barely lasted one run. But the sad part is I just can't get used to the feel of the strap on my neck.
customer_reviews.author: @TrevorHikes

customer_reviews.title: Really great sound and comforable
customer_reviews.text: I really love these headphones — they sound & feel great. My only issue with them is the battery life. I’ve never run out when using them if I started the day fully charged but mine seem to lose power pretty quickly when not in use. The other day I had them fully charged and took them with me but didn’t end up using them until the next day and by then the batter was already mostly depleted.
customer_reviews.author: C.M. & T.M.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding sound, but serious design flaws
customer_reviews.text: I am big B&W fan, and I was not surprised that the sound quality of these wireless earbuds was impressive. But the strap/control piece that holds the microphone sits on and rubs up against your neck or shirt collar (rather than being suspended vertically along your neck) and this muffles sound input and adds a lot of noise. I found them essentially unusable as a phone. Frankly, I was willing to use these solely for music, but then the left ear bud stopped working within the month, and the same exact thing happened with the replacement pair Amazon provided, so I returned them for a refund. Sadly.
customer_reviews.author: Lugo

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with these.
customer_reviews.text: These are in my opinion the best wireless headphones I've worn. They are so light, flexible and comfortable. I've worn them dozens of times now for hours at a time. I've had no issues with connectivity and the sound had been clear and vibrant.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Mama

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a week
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality, quality materials. Would be great headphones if they worked. Unfortunately mine stopped working reliably after about a week. Random disconnections, "battery low" messages when fully charge, endless reboot cycles. The power button doesn't work so I need to reboot them every time I want to use them. Connecting takes about a minute every time. I haven't been able to get support as I'm not in the US. Terrible experience at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Andreas

customer_reviews.title: Sound good, but...
customer_reviews.text: Second pair ive had, one side of this second pair started shorting out as well, sound good but only for two months or so then useless. 2nd pair ive had thats done this.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality Sound And Battery Life!
customer_reviews.text: These have become my favorite pair of headphones. I prefer in ear and these are amazing. The sound quality for music is way better than anything I’ve tried so far. Call quality is surprisingly clear and good quality as well. It lasts several hours on one charge. That includes calls and listening to music. It has a pretty impressive range as well. I’m not really sure of the distance, but it works through a couple of walls and a long distance. I highly recommend these headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly S.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Compared to my Sony wh1000xm3s, these are of similar sound quality. Very happy I bought these. Comfy also. Not tried for phone calls, battery life ok, I only use them around an hour at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Allen

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 2 months before stopped holding a charge.
customer_reviews.text: Lasted just over two months and now they will not hold a charge. I plug them into charge and the green light comes on and flashes telling me they are charging. But then I unplug them 3 hours later and they are still dead. Tried leaving them in for longer and still nothing. Tried different plugs and leads to no avail. Will be send back this week. For £169 I expected more than 2 months of use. Major let down.
customer_reviews.author: James Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Hello, I'm using these headphones every day in my work calls, great!
customer_reviews.author: Elena Ionescu

customer_reviews.title: Seriously impressed with the sound.
customer_reviews.text: Truly remarkable earphones, I own a pair of B&W PX headphones (which are phenomenal) so I thought I’d see what B&W could do with a much smaller form factor. Wow! They have exceeded my expectations for how good wireless earbuds could possibly sound. The noise floor of the onboard amp isn’t totally silent but it’s close enough and I can’t begin to imagine the engineering challenges involved in producing such a tiny combo of DAC, amp and drivers to this standard. Luckily they happened to fit my ears perfectly straight from the box and the isolation is very decent without comply-type foam or custom moulds - your fitting experience may differ. Well done B&W!
customer_reviews.author: Paul C H

customer_reviews.title: So glad I went for these.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing earphones, very pleased with the purchase. The sound is as clear as a bell, more than enough bass, for small wireless earphones they have outdone themselves. The only negative is the case that comes with them, calling it a case is being generous, it’s a cheap bag, B&W would have been better not supplying it, than this effort, that being said the earphones make up for the case, so don’t let that put you off.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

product_meta.title: Bowers & Wilkins PI3 in Ear Wireless Headphones - Space Grey
product_meta.description: Color:Space GreyDo anything hear everything Our in-ear headphones are built for active lives and measured by the same standards of audio excellence that have guided Bowers & Wilkins for 50 years
feature_bullets: SMALL HEADPHONES MORE DRIVERS The headphones are smaller The music isn’t Experience music like no other in-ear headphone thanks to a custom designed balance armature driver for crisp highs and a second dynamic driver for the mid’s and low’s with separate amplifiers for a full forceful sound Bowers & Wilkins Hybrid Dual Driver technology is here

DON'T MISS A THING No matter what you're listening to or watching or playing hear what you were meant to hear The new aptX codec gives you pure unmatched audio whether you're traveling moving or standing still in the sound
GO FOR 8 HOURS Enough battery life for two marathons A quick charge gives you two hours of audio playback in 15 minutes for another go around the track
HEAR AND BE HEARD Your voice matters The PI3 microphone carries it clearly on every call Voices are heard with the same clarity as the music
A MEASURED FEEL Constructed from soft coated silicone and rubber The PI3 fits like it was made for you It holds on even when you’re going as fast as you can

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars148 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
